text:
Procurement Contract 
 
Supplier: Alpha Suppliers Inc. 
Buyer: XYZ Corporation 
Contract Number: PC-001 
Effective Date: January 1, 2023 
Expiry Date: December 31, 2023 
 
1. Introduction 
 
This Procurement Contract (the "Contract") is entered into between XYZ 
Corporation (hereinafter referred to as the "Buyer") and Alpha 
Suppliers Inc. (hereinafter referred to as the "Supplier"). The 
purpose of this Contract is to outline the terms and conditions for 
the procurement of goods and/or services as specified herein. 
 
2. Scope of Work 
 
The Buyer engages the Supplier to provide the following goods and/or 
services (hereinafter referred to as the "Deliverables"): 
 
- Office stationery and supplies, including pens, paper, folders, and 
other stationery items, as specified in the attached Purchase Order. 
- Any additional stationery items requested by the Buyer during the 
contract period. 
 
3. Purchase Order 
 
The Buyer shall issue a Purchase Order (PO) to the Supplier for each 
procurement of goods and/or services. The PO shall include, but not be 
limited to, the following information: 
 
- PO Number: PO-00123 
- Description of the Deliverables: Office stationery and supplies as 
specified in the attached Purchase Order. 
- Quantity: As per the Buyer's requirements. 
- Price per unit: To be agreed upon between the Buyer and Supplier. 
- Delivery schedule: As per the Buyer's request. 
- Payment terms: Net 30 days from the date of receipt and acceptance 
of the Deliverables. 
- Any other relevant terms and conditions as specified in the attached 
Purchase Order. 
 
4. Delivery and Acceptance 
 
The Supplier shall ensure timely delivery of the Deliverables as per 
the agreed-upon schedule outlined in the respective Purchase Order(s). 
The Buyer shall inspect and evaluate the Deliverables upon receipt. 
Acceptance of the Deliverables shall be subject to compliance with the 

page - [1]
specified quality standards, specifications, and any other 
requirements stated in the Contract. 
 
5. Payment Terms 
 
The Buyer agrees to pay the Supplier as per the agreed-upon payment 
terms specified in the Purchase Order(s). Payment shall be made within 
30 days of receipt and acceptance of the Deliverables. Invoices should 
be submitted by the Supplier in accordance with the guidelines 
provided by the Buyer. 
 
6. Quality Assurance 
 
The Supplier warrants that all Deliverables provided under this 
Contract shall conform to the specified quality standards, free from 
defects in materials and workmanship. In the event of any non-
conformities or defects, the Supplier shall promptly rectify the issue 
or replace the Deliverables at no additional cost to the Buyer. 
 
7. Intellectual Property Rights 
 
Any intellectual property rights associated with the Deliverables 
shall remain the property of the Supplier unless otherwise agreed upon 
in writing. The Buyer shall have a non-exclusive, royalty-free license 
to use the Deliverables solely for the purpose specified in this 
Contract. 
 
8. Confidentiality 
 
Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of any proprietary 
or sensitive information disclosed during the course of this Contract. 
This includes, but is not limited to, trade secrets, financial 
information, technical data, and any other confidential information 
identified as such. 
 
9. Termination 
 
Either party may terminate this Contract in the event of a material 
breach by the other party. Termination shall be effective upon written 
notice to the breaching party. In the event of termination, the 
parties shall fulfill any outstanding obligations and settle any 
outstanding payments. 
 
10. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution 
 
This Contract shall be governed by and construed in accordance with 
the laws of [Jurisdiction]. Any disputes arising out of or in 
connection with this Contract shall be resolved through amicable 
negotiations between the parties. If a resolution cannot be reached, 

page - [2]
the parties agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the 
courts of [Jurisdiction]. 
 
[Signatures] 
 
________________________ 
John Doe 
Procurement Manager 
XYZ Corporation 
[Date] 
 
________________________ 
Jane Smith 
Sales Manager 
Alpha Suppliers Inc. 
[Date] 
 

page - [3]

[Signatures] 
 
________________________ 
John Doe 
Procurement Manager 
XYZ Corporation 
[Date] 
 
________________________ 
Jane Smith 
Sales Manager 
Alpha Suppliers Inc. 
[Date]
